title.description: the user-defined title for the saved card

tasks.description: each individual task and its properties within the card

task.description: the individual task as it is displayed

position.description: the position of the task on the card via the ID of the button in which it is housed

completed.description: whether or not the task has been completed and therefore can be blacked out on the card

bingos.description: the number of bingo wins on the card

blackout.description: whether or not every task on the card has been completed

_id.description: the unique identifier of the card
